message: Let's split fairly, Bob, but I get a little extra for going first.
I think we should split fairly, Alice.  This seems like the most straightforward way to end this.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable.  I'll take a little less than last time, but I still need to come out ahead.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. You're losing value with every round. I'm offering you a deal where you still get a good chunk, but it's time to finalize this.
Bob, I understand the situation. This is my final offer. It's more than fair considering the time pressure.
